What we do?

A private club for web artists for less than 1 beer/month

We are your informer

  • We are your eyes out there. We read thoroughly the top 1000 sources of web design & development instead of you. We put all our effort to find the very best resources and meaningful news and summary it to you.

Free access to alexadria

  • Alexandria is our professional database. Have you been problems finding on your bookmarks? Join our club and forget saving thousand links.

Exclusive discounts

  • Enjoy an average 15% off in most of the web design and development markets. Envato, creativemarket, etc.

How it works

  1. Get your subscription.

  2. Once a week you will recive our summary, enjoy.

  3. When you miss a link or tool search our alexandria library.

  4. Save money buying your professional stuff.

  5. Get in touch with our community we.are.valencia.io

What valencia.io is

Valencia.io is:

  • An exclusive club for web designers & developers.

  • Valencia.io is a service for artists.

  • We do content curation.

  • We are the guy who lend you the book underlined the day before the exam.

  • We are open source lovers. Check open.valencia.io out.

Valencia.io is not:

  • We are not a blog.

  • We are not a newsletter.

  • We are not a magazine.
